chunks.text: So you can be talking to somebody maybe on a game and maybe you're going to tell them what your first name is.
But are you going to share things like your passwords or the school that you go to or where you live?
You wouldn't pass information like that on because it's really important to keep that secure.
But if there's any question at all when you're not sure about who you're talking to, just stop.
Don't talk to them and go and find an adult that you trust and ask them what you should do.
Once again, NetSafe is a great website that you can go to to get information about keeping yourself safe in that regard as well.

text: So you can be talking to somebody maybe on a game and maybe you're going to tell them what your first name is. That might be okay. But are you going to share things like your passwords or the school that you go to or where you live? You wouldn't pass information like that on because it's really important to keep that secure. But if there's any question at all when you're not sure about who you're talking to, just stop. Don't talk to them and go and find an adult that you trust and ask them what you should do. Once again, NetSafe is a great website that you can go to to get information about keeping yourself safe in that regard as well.
